The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 17 September is 3,244 (375.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 September, there were 117 new confirmed cases (13.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 September, there were 129 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (12 fewer cases).
